name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **Go**, **Java**, **C#**, and **C++**, with a strong background in **Linux** and **Postgres** for backend development. Skilled in data processing and asynchronous work paradigms, enhancing efficiency and scalability in enterprise applications. Demonstrated expertise in VM management and protocols, bringing a solid understanding of RFCs and automation strategies.

My unique blend of technical skills includes full-stack development leveraging frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, along with server-side technologies such as **FastAPI** and **Django**. I possess experience in cloud environments including **Azure** and **AWS** and have led the development of secure, compliant applications following standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I am adept in microservices architecture and implementing CI/CD pipelines, while integrating AI/ML capabilities for advanced data processing and predictive analytics.
